Sentencas: Au/La1-xSrxMnO3 (x approximate to 0.4, Au/LSM) nanocomposites were synthesised and investigated for their potential use in an oxidative coupling of methane (OCM) reaction in a fixed bed reactor (FBR) and solid oxide fuel cell reactor (SOFC).
Titulo: Au/La1-xSrxMnO3 nanocomposite for chemical-energy cogeneration in solid oxide fuel cell reactor

Sentencas: A 17.9% C-2 selectivity and a 10.8% CH4 conversion have been obtained in a FBR at 1073 K and 6:1 CH4/O-2.
Titulo: Au/La1-xSrxMnO3 nanocomposite for chemical-energy cogeneration in solid oxide fuel cell reactor

Sentencas: The electron motive force was 0.86 Vat the power density of 12.4 mA
Titulo: Au/La1-xSrxMnO3 nanocomposite for chemical-energy cogeneration in solid oxide fuel cell reactor

Sentencas: cm(-2) during cogeneration through OCM in SOFC reactor.
Titulo: Au/La1-xSrxMnO3 nanocomposite for chemical-energy cogeneration in solid oxide fuel cell reactor

Sentencas: A 7% methane conversion and a 5.7% C-2 selectivity were obtained when the air flow rate was 30 ml/min at 1123 K. (C) 2012
Titulo: Au/La1-xSrxMnO3 nanocomposite for chemical-energy cogeneration in solid oxide fuel cell reactor
